name: Homegear::createUser
description: This method creates a new user in Homegear.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The alphanumeric name of the new user

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password of the new user

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: An array of group IDs the user should belong to

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: Metadata to store with the user
